name: jquery-datetimepicker
description: jQuery Plugin DateTimePicker it is DatePicker and TimePicker in one

scripts.minify: uglifyjs jquery.datetimepicker.js -c -m -o build/jquery.datetimepicker.min.js && uglifycss jquery.datetimepicker.css > build/jquery.datetimepicker.min.css
scripts.github: git add --all  && git commit -m "New version %npm_package_version% " && git tag %npm_package_version% && git push --tags origin HEAD:master && npm publish
scripts.build: npm run minify && npm run concat && npm run minifyconcat
scripts.public: npm run test && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run build && npm run github

author: Chupurnov <chupurnov@gmail.com> (https://xdsoft.net/)
